paper_abstract: In this letter, we present a low-complexity residual symbol timing offset (STO) estimation scheme in a long term evolution (LTE) downlink system. The proposed scheme is designed to estimate STO without a priori knowledge of cell-specific reference signals, which reduces the arithmetic complexity while maintaining a similar performance to the conventional algorithm.
paper_title: Low-Complexity Residual Symbol Timing Offset Estimation Scheme in LTE Downlink System
